thread.title: Bucks unveil 'Fear the Deer' uniform, court
thread.title_full: Bucks unveil 'Fear the Deer' uniform, court

title: Bucks unveil 'Fear the Deer' uniform, court
text:
Bucks unveil 'Fear the Deer' uniform, court Associated Press 8:57 a.m. CDT October 4, 2015 The Milwaukee Bucks'"Fear the Deer" uniform. (Photo: Milwaukee Bucks/Lucian McAfee) 
MILWAUKEE â€” The Milwaukee Bucks say they'll be the first NBA team to use an alternate court design and jerseys, building on their "Fear the Deer" motto. 
The alternate court will be used for four games this season, when players also will wear a new alternate uniform. The different looks were unveiled Saturday on the team's website. 
The alternate floor will feature a Bucks logo at center court without the team's name. The team says the look would set a "simple, aggressive tone." 
The alternate jersey has the Bucks' fierce-looking deer logo against a black backdrop. The new looks will debut for the Dec. 9 game against the Los Angeles Clippers. 
The Milwaukee Bucks'"Fear the Deer" court. (Photo: Milwaukee Bucks) Read or Share this story: http://gbpg.net/1RoJLG0 TOP VIDEOS
